page.title: 07Industry in Arundel
page.content: Most of the industry in Arundel is situated in a small{industrial estate} in Fitzalan Road. This was built by Arun Council consists of about 10 small{factories}including:- "Dandos" who construct well-drilling equipment. They employ about 60 men and send their products all over the world. "Marchant Joinery" make wooden staircases, window frames etc. which are required in special sizes not available from larger firms. "Blastreat" is a factory which cleans metal structures by sandblasting them and spraying them with paint to prevent re-rusting. The employees have to wear protective masks. "Stonemason" make memorial stones for gravestones etc. in cemetaries. Some of the other factories only employ 2 or 3 people.
